00023 class OutputStream;
00024 
00025 class PrintWriter : public virtual Object {
00026 public:
00027     PrintWriter(OutputStream& _out) : out(_out), _uc(false) {}
00028 
00029     OutputStream& outputStream();
00030 
00031     bool uppercase();
00032     void setUppercase(bool);
00033 
00034     operator bool();
00035 
00036     operator<<(bool b);
00037     operator<<(char c);
00038     operator<<(sint i);
00039     operator<<(suint i);
00040     operator<<(slong l);
00041     operator<<(sulong l);
00042     operator<<(float f);
00043     operator<<(bool b);
00044     operator<<(String s);
00045     operator<<(PrintWriter&(*f)(PrintWriter&));
00046 private:
00047     OutputStream& out;
00048     bool _uc;
00049 };
